results.title: A resolution designating the week of May 21 through May 27, 2017, as "National Public Works Week".
results.short_title: A resolution designating the week of May 21 through May 27, 2017, as "National Public Works Week".
results.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S3225; text as passed Senate: CR S3223-3224)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates the week of May 21-May 27, 2017, as National Public Works Week.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates the week of May 21-May 27, 2017, as National Public Works Week.

actions.description: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S3225; text as passed Senate: CR S3223-3224)
